mapper.sql: sm.menu_id ,sm.level ,sm.url , sm.name ,sm.parent_id , sm.sort , sm.disable , sm.is_deleted , sm.gmt_create , sm.gmt_modify , sm.img
mapper.select: SELECT sf.id, sf.function_url, sf.name, sf.level, sf.icon_source, sf.code, sf.parent_code FROM user_role ur INNER JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON srm.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN sys_function sf ON sf.id = srm.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND sf.status = 'enabled' AND sf.function_type = 1 GROUP BY sf.sort_num
SELECT sf.id, sf.function_url, sf.name, sf.level, sf.icon_source, sf.code, sf.parent_code FROM sys_function sf WHERE sf.status = 'enabled' AND sf.function_type = 1 ORDER BY sf.sort_num
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_function WHERE code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_function ( name , code , parent_code , sys_function_code , level , function_url , sort_num , function_type , platform_type , status , icon_type , icon_source , gmt_create , gmt_modify ) VALUES( #{name}, #{code} , #{parentCode} , #{sysFunctionCode} , #{level} , #{functionUrl} , #{sortNum} , #{functionType} , #{platformType} , #{status} , #{iconType} , #{iconSource} , NOW() , NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_function SET name = #{name} , code = #{code} , parent_code = #{parentCode} , sys_function_code = #{sysFunctionCode} , level = #{level} , function_url = #{functionUrl} , sort_num = #{sortNum} , function_type = #{functionType} , platform_type = #{platformType} , status = #{status} , icon_type = #{iconType} , icon_source = #{iconSource} , gmt_modify = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT sf.id as menuId, sf.code as id, sf.name as name , sf.parent_code as pId, true as open FROM sys_function sf WHERE sf.status = 'enabled'

SELECT sf.code as id, sf.parent_code as pId, IF(srm.role_menu_id is null , FALSE , TRUE) checked FROM sys_function sf LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON srm.menu_id = sf.id and srm.role_id = #{roleId} WHERE sf.status = 'enabled'
